original_title: Always on - Wie viel Macht haben digitale Medien Ã¼ber uns?
overview: Constant typing, sharing and checking smartphones has long been part of everyday life for young people. But what are the opportunities and risks of the Internet, and shouldn't we sometimes rethink our own use? What is meant is the protection of minors in the media.
title: Always on - How much power does digital media have over us?
